short_summary: The Department of National Defence (DND), 41 Canadian Brigade Group (41 CBG), Alberta (AB.), has the as-and when required requirement for the supply and service of Dispersed Hot Meals, Boxed/Cold Meals, Between Meal Supplements and Workplace Refreshments to various military units operating and training in Red Deer, AB.

All required supporting documentation and offer submission must be submitted by 17 November 2023 at 2:00pm EST. All offers submitted after 2:00pm EST will result in the offer being declared non-responsive . Summary: …
full_summary:
================================

# Catering Services - Red Deer, AB

[Publication Date]: October 17, 2023

[ Tender Closing Date]: November 17, 2023, 14:00:00 (EST)

### Tender Summary

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a contractor to provide catering services to military units operating and training in Red Deer, AB. The contract will have a one-year initial period, with the option to extend for two additional one-year periods.

### Description of Services

The contractor will be required to supply, with or without notice, various types of meals and refreshments, including:

- Dispersed Hot Meals
- Boxed/Bag Cold Meals
- Between Meal Supplements
- Workplace Refreshments

### Locations of Service

- Red Deer, AB

### Solicitation Details

- Solicitation Number: WS4051453296
- Solicitation Date: October 17, 2023
- Amendement Number: 1
- Tender Closing Date: November 17, 2023
- Tender Status: Expired

### Contracting Entity

- Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC
- Postal Code: K1A 0S5
- Country: Canada

### Procurement Method

The procurement approach will be a Competitive - Open Bidding method, where qualified contractors will submit their bids for consideration. The selection criteria will be based on Lowest Cost-per-Point.

### Contact Information

- Diane Warnell, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- Email: [diane.warnell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:diane.warnell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

For more information about this tender, please refer to the [Ariba Discovery posting](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16557407?extsite=MTY1NTc0MDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
